scripts.dev: rm -rf .cache && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp -a json build && python3 -m http.server & parcel watch ./index.html -d build & (sleep 5 && xdg-open localhost:8000/build/index.html)
scripts.dist: rm -rf .cache && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -a json dist && parcel build ./index.html --no-cache -d dist/ --public-url /
